title: DESC FUNCTION command: New column IS_AGGREGATE in output | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs: This behavior change is in the 2024_04 bundle.
For the current status of the bundle, refer to Bundle History.

When this behavior change bundle is enabled, the output of the DESC FUNCTION command includes
the following new column(s) when the function has a Python handler:
TRUE if the function is a user-defined aggregate function (UDAF); otherwise, FALSE.
